snippet: Israel’s internal security agency charged Hikmat Massarwa with crimes including contact with a foreign agent after he traveled to Syria to fight alongside the rebels.
abstract: Israel’s internal security agency charges Arab-Israeli citizen Hikmat Massarwa with crimes including contact with foreign agent after he traveled to Syria to fight alongside rebels.
lead_paragraph: Israel’s internal security agency charged Hikmat Massarwa with crimes including contact with a foreign agent after he traveled to Syria to fight alongside the rebels.

headline.seo: Arab Israeli Man Accused of Joining Syrian Rebels
